questions.q: What cybersecurity risks do media companies face today?
questions.a: Threats like ransomware, phishing, and content piracy targeting digital IP and user data.

questions.q: How does RiskMan help with GDPR or regional content compliance?
questions.a: We conduct privacy assessments and create compliance roadmaps tailored to local laws.

questions.q: What is Third-Party Risk Management in media?
questions.a: Evaluating and managing risks posed by external vendors, agencies, and partners.

questions.q: Do you help with process automation in creative workflows?
questions.a: Yes, our consulting services include automation strategies for production, ad ops, and more.

questions.q: Can you help with ISO or SOC certifications for media firms?
questions.a: Absolutely. We offer ISO 27001, SOC 2, and other relevant certifications to strengthen governance.

questions.q: How fast can we deploy cybersecurity solutions?
questions.a: Depending on scope, quick wins can be delivered within weeks using our pre-built frameworks.

questions.q: What makes RiskMan different from IT firms?

questions.q: Do you offer support for international expansion?
questions.a: Yes, including regulatory guidance, IT infrastructure review, and compliance alignment.
